description.text:
The voice of an ocean's echo provides inspiration to allies. This ability is identical to bardic performance (using Perform [sing] only), allowing her to inspire courage at 1st level, inspire competence at 3rd level, and inspire heroics at 15th level, as a bard of the ocean's echo's level. It is usable a total number of rounds per day equal to her level + her Charisma modifier (minimum 1).
This ability replaces the revelations gained at 1st, 3rd, and 15th level.
